constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in `backend/main.mo` (no additional backend services).

Do not integrate external email/SMS/push/WebSocket services.
nonGoals: Implementing real payments, subscriptions, or paid course enrollment flows
Issuing certificates or building a full certificate lifecycle/administration portal (verification only as specified)
Sending emails from the contact form (store inquiries in-app and/or show success state only)
